thread.title: Here's Why You Shouldn't Miss Rudhramadevi, The Epic Drama
thread.title_full: Here's Why You Shouldn't Miss Rudhramadevi, The Epic Drama

title: Here's Why You Shouldn't Miss Rudhramadevi, The Epic Drama
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
After the phenomenal success of Baahubali , here is another visual bonanza for Telugu movie lovers, which is releasing this Friday i.e., October 9. Rudhramadevi is not only the India's first stereoscopic 3D film but also the first to depict the rich history of Telugu land. Rudhramadevi (3D) (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
Touted to be an epic drama, one must catch the film only in theaters to experience and appreciate the efforts of different departments of film making. 
Anushka , Rana Daggubati , Allu Arjun , Nithya Menen and all the other star cast would obviously pull you to theaters but remember it is really rare to get to see your favorite actors in different avatars and you shouldn't be missing Rudhramadevi. 
It also promises to offer an outstanding sound and the entire re-recording has been done in London by Maestro Ilaiyaraaja. 
The film tells you about the lesser known history of Telugu land and this brave woman, Rudhramadevi , who ruled the Kakatiya dynasty with utmost prowess. 
And lastly, watch this sincere effort of Gunasekhar or do not come back to complain Telugu makers are always stuck around commercial formulas. Here's Why You Shouldn't Miss Rudhramadevi, The Epic Drama 1/8
